_comment: Complete Application Profile - Auto-fill for job applications

work_authorization.professional_answer_authorized: Yes, I am currently authorized to work in the United States.
work_authorization.professional_answer_sponsorship_professi: No, I do not require visa sponsorship at this time.
work_authorization.visa_status_if_asked: Authorized to work in the United States

employment.notice_period_professional: I can start immediately upon receiving an offer, as I have no contractual notice period.

compensation.salary_expectations_professional: Based on my 4+ years of experience in software engineering and my technical skill set, I'm seeking a competitive compensation package in the range of $100,000 to $120,000 annually.

availability.start_date_professional: I am available to start within one week of receiving and accepting an offer
availability.relocation_professional: Yes, I am open to relocating for the right opportunity
availability.work_arrangement_professional: I am flexible and open to remote, hybrid, or onsite work arrangements

current.school: The University of Texas at Arlington

undergraduate.note: Add if you have bachelor's degree details

security_clearance.professional_answer: No, I do not currently hold security clearance. As an international student on F1 status, I am not eligible for security clearance at this time.

demographics_eeo.veteran_status: I am not a protected veteran
demographics_eeo.disability_status: No, I do not have a disability

professional_preferences.industries_professional: I am open to opportunities across various industries, including technology, healthcare, finance, e-commerce, and more
professional_preferences.travel_professional: I am comfortable with occasional business travel up to 50% of the time

standard_screening_answers.why_interested_template: I'm excited about {COMPANY_NAME}'s mission and the opportunity to contribute to {KEY_INITIATIVE}. With my 4+ years of experience in software engineering, particularly in {RELEVANT_TECH}, I believe I can make meaningful contributions to your team while continuing to grow professionally.
standard_screening_answers.why_leave_current_job: I'm seeking new challenges and opportunities to expand my technical expertise. While I've gained valuable experience at Albertsons, I'm looking for a role that offers greater exposure to {SPECIFIC_TECHNOLOGY/DOMAIN} and aligns more closely with my long-term career goals.
standard_screening_answers.career_goals: My goal is to continue growing as a software engineer, taking on increasingly complex technical challenges and eventually moving into technical leadership roles. I'm particularly interested in deepening my expertise in distributed systems and cloud architecture.
standard_screening_answers.strengths: Strong problem-solving abilities, proficiency in full-stack development (React, Python, Node.js), experience with cloud platforms (AWS), and a track record of improving system performance and reliability
standard_screening_answers.weakness: I tend to be very detail-oriented, which sometimes means I spend extra time perfecting solutions. I've learned to balance this by setting clear priorities and timelines
standard_screening_answers.achievements: At Albertsons, I improved service reliability by 24% and reduced API latency by 31% through optimized microservice design. At ValueLabs, I improved query performance by 26% through database optimization.
standard_screening_answers.handle_deadl ine_pressure: I prioritize tasks based on impact, communicate proactively with stakeholders, and leverage agile methodologies to break down complex work into manageable sprints
standard_screening_answers.team_collaboration: I believe in open communication, knowledge sharing, and collective ownership. I regularly participate in code reviews, mentor junior developers, and contribute to technical discussions

location_questions.spain_portugal_etc: No, I am not currently located in Spain, Portugal, Cyprus, Poland, Serbia, Georgia, Armenia, or Turkey. I am based in Arlington, Texas, United States.
location_questions.russian_fluently: No, I do not speak Russian fluently. My primary languages are English and Telugu.

references.professional_answer: Yes, I have professional references available upon request
